songs.title: Spider/WAVES
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Teri Gender Bender]
Injuries are slashed deep open
Messiahs hold them still
Injuries are slashed deep open
Messiahs hold them still

[Verse 1: Teri Gender Bender]
Heatwaves calling for a thunder strike
You’ve tied us up, slowly lost the light
Losing five pesos on a day of work hard
For once, come closer, listen to my cry

[Pre-Chorus: Teri Gender Bender]
You’re a liar
You can’t erase my fight from prophecies
No apologies are wanted
Razors cut your grace

[Chorus: Teri Gender Bender]
Injuries are slashed deep open
Messiahs hold them still
Injuries are slashed deep open
Messiahs hold them still
In, you want in, in, you want in

[Verse 2: Teri Gender Bender]
Slave gold mercy isn’t here to stay
Patience leaves me when I see your way
Confusion arises as I try to latch on
I was Mother Mary, smothered by her God

[Pre-Chorus: Teri Gender Bender]
You’re a liar
You can’t erase my fight from prophecies
No apologies are wanted
Razors cut your grace

[Chorus: Teri Gender Bender]
Injuries are slashed deep open
Messiahs hold them still
Injuries are slashed deep open
Messiahs hold them still
In, you want in, in, you want in, in, you want in

[Bridge: Teri Gender Bender]
Lies, they’re all lies!
Your feathers are falling while you fly
Why can’t I feel anything when you say goodbye?

[Chorus: Teri Gender Bender]
Injuries are slashed deep open
Messiahs hold them still
Injuries are slashed deep open
Messiahs hold them still
Injuries are slashed deep open
Messiahs hold them still
Injuries are slashed deep open
Messiahs hold them still
In, you want in, in, you want in, in, you want in
In, you want in, in, you want in, in, you want in
Injuries are slashed deep open
Messiahs hold them still

[Outro: Jello Biafra]
Not in service, not in service
Is that all anyone aspires to these days, is "Not in service"?
They can't even count their dead, much less remember them
Maybe what they need is to abolish the study of law

You know how it is around here
You want anything to say to me, put it in writing
They'll sue you for believing in something these days
They wear the individual on their face like a mask, but their hearts are embroidered with industry

Man "thinks" but he only succeeds in enslaving himself
But, I've invented a device for the simultaneous pacification of various tapeworms
And for every professional net of pre-disposed insult: a shot of true nobility!
